page.title: 10THE SWARBRICK FAMILY
page.content: My day is spent doing household chores.I tidy up the childrens bedrooms and make the beds.The longest job is cleaning the kitchen as we have two dogs,a labrador retriver and a springer spaniel and they always make a mess. If the weather is good I potter about in the garden,weeding the borders, cutting the grass and keeping the greenhouse tidy. The children come out of school at 3:3Opm and 3:45pm I collect them in the car and arrive home to cook their tea. My husband has his seperatly as he never gets home before 7:OOpm. In the evening we all relax,either watching T.V or sitting in the garden discussing the days happenings,we retire to bed early as my husband has another early start and the children school.
